Title: Closed Circuit
Writer: Nicola Badalucco (story), Mario Gallo (story), Nicola Badalucco (screenplay), Mario Gallo (screenplay), Giuliano Montaldo (screenplay)
Actors: Flavio Bucci, Aurore Clément, Tony Kendall, Ettore Manni
Plot: The story that sometimes a movie watching in 3D might be fatal dangerous.
